title: Rob Kardashian and Blac Chyna Preparing for ‘Ugly’ Custody Fight over Dream â€” as Their Show’s Future Remains ‘Up in the Air,’ Sources Say
text:
While Rob Kardashian appears to be all smiles in his Instagram selfies with daughter Dream RenĂŠe , behind the scenes things are getting heated as he prepares for a custody battle with Blac Chyna .
â€œI expect things to get ugly,â€ a source tells PEOPLE. â€œChyna wants full custody with Rob only getting visitations.â€
The source says Rob, 29, is never left alone with his daughter , 3 months, and a Kardashian family insider adds that he is getting the full support of his family as he navigates his new life as a single dad.
â€œTheyâ€™ve all always had their issues with Chyna but they were happy when the relationship was working and when Rob was happy,â€ says the insider. â€œBut at the end of the day, they all raise an eyebrow at Chyna and her intentions.â€
Rob is currently filming forÂ Keeping Up with the Kardashians and an E! spokesperson said in a statement to PEOPLE that production is â€œcontinuing to shoot with all the family members, and are covering Rob and his relationship with Chyna.â€
FROM COINAGE: See Where 6 Stars Were Before They Were Famous 
But with a reconciliation seemingly not in the cards â€” a second source close to Kardashian tells PEOPLE they are â€œnot back togetherâ€ â€” plans for season 2 of the former coupleâ€™s E! reality show Rob & Chyna are currently â€œup in the air,â€ according to a production source.
The pairÂ went public with their relationship in January 2016 and initially raised eyebrows due to Chynaâ€™s complicated history with the Kardashian-Jenner family: Chyna shares a son with Robâ€™sÂ sister Kylie Jenner â€˜s longtime boyfriend Tyga , and is also best friends with Amber Rose , an ex of Kanye West , who is now married to Robâ€™s sister Kim Kardashian West .
Rob proposed Â to Chyna, 28, in April 2016, and a month later, they announced they were expecting their first child; they welcomed Dream in November.
In February, PEOPLE confirmed that the engaged couple split after a yearlong romance, which included lots of ups and downs , including their first split in March 2016 .
Reps for Kardashian and Blac Chyna have not responded to requests for comment.
